name: Flexitol Heel Balm
description: An exfoliating, moisturizing heel balm designed to soften and renew dry, cracked skin on feet, ideal for pedicures.

Its non-greasy formula is perfect for regular use during pedicures and everyday foot care, providing lasting softness and comfort.
